message_1:
What is the enthalpy of vaporization of ethanol? Given the following information:

- The boiling point of ethanol is 78.4 °C
- The normal boiling point of ethanol is 78.4 °C
- The heat of vaporization of ethanol is 38.56 kJ/mol
- The molar mass of ethanol is 46.07 g/mol. 

Calculate the enthalpy of vaporization of ethanol in kJ/mol.
message_2: The enthalpy of vaporization of ethanol is already given in the information provided. It is 38.56 kJ/mol.
